001/**
002 * Represents an item with a name, description, and weight.
003 * Items are used by players in the game and have associated properties.
004 * 
005 * @author Pierre MATAR
006 * @version 2
007 */
008public class Item
009{
010    private String aDescription;
011    private int aWeigth;
012    private String aName;
013    
014      /**
015     * Constructs a new Item with the given name, description, and weight.
016     * 
017     * @param pName The name of the item.
018     * @param pDescription A description of the item.
019     * @param pWeigth The weight of the item.
020     */
021    
022    public Item(final String pName, final String pDescription, final int pWeigth) {
023        this.aName = pName;
024        this.aDescription = pDescription;
025        this.aWeigth = pWeigth;
026        
027    }
028        
029    /**
030     * Returns the description of the item.
031     * 
032     * @return The item's description.
033     */
034    
035    public String getItemDescription() {
036        return this.aDescription;
037    }
038    
039    /**
040     * Returns the weight of the item.
041     * 
042     * @return The item's weight.
043     */
044    
045    public int getItemWeigth() {
046        return this.aWeigth;
047    }
048    
049    /**
050     * Returns the name of the item.
051     * 
052     * @return The item's name.
053     */
054    public String getName() {
055        return this.aName;
056    }
057    
058    /**
059     * Returns a string representation of the item, including its name, description, and weight.
060     * 
061     * @return The item's details as a string.
062     */
063    
064    public String getItemString() {
065        return this.aName +" "+this.aDescription + " " + this.aWeigth;
066    }
067}
